source: TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_SEQ_00<tab>Slowly but surely, Alphinaud is regaining his composure.
target: TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_SEQ_00<tab>スペキュラ・インペラトリスのアルフィノは、悔しそうに佇んでいる。

source: TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_TODO_01<tab>Search for wounded soldiers in need of assistance.
TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_MNAAGO_000_005<tab>No, no, no! You can't! Not now... <sniffle> <sob>
target:
TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_MNAAGO_000_005<tab>隊長が……隊長が……！
うわああああ……！

source: TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_ALPHINAUD_000_020<tab>...Forgive me. Now is not the time for vows of vengeance. We must remain calm and rational and in control.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_ALPHINAUD_000_020<tab>す、すまない……熱くなってしまって……。
こんなときだからこそ、冷静にならなければいけないというのに。

source: TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_ALPHINAUD_000_021<tab>The imperials have demonstrated a willingness to fire on their own. So long as we remain here, we are in danger.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_ALPHINAUD_000_021<tab>ラウバーン局長は、撤退を決めたのだったね。
確かに次の砲撃の可能性を考えれば、ここは危険だ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_ALPHINAUD_000_022<tab>We three will see to Commander Kemp's body. Find my sister and return to Ala Ghiri.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_ALPHINAUD_000_022<tab>コンラッド隊長の亡骸は、私たちの手で運ぼう。
君は「アリゼー」に声をかけてから、アラギリに向かってくれ。
現地で合流し、態勢を立て直そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_LYSE_000_025<tab>We'll look after him. You should go.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_LYSE_000_025<tab>わかった……コンラッド隊長のことは、
アタシたちに任せて。

source: TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_ALPHINAUD_000_035<tab>We will meet you in Ala Ghiri. I pray you find my sister and leave at once.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_ALPHINAUD_000_035<tab>君は「アリゼー」に声をかけてから、アラギリに向かってくれ。
現地で合流し、態勢を立て直そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_ALISAIE_000_040<tab>There, that should suffice for now. Go on and join the others.
target: TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_ALISAIE_000_040<tab>さあ、立ち上がって、早く逃げなさい。

source: TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_ALISAIE_000_041<tab>...Tell me you've found Alphinaud. Tell me he is all right.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_ALISAIE_000_041<tab>ひどい状況ね……。
それで、アルフィノたちは見つかったの？

source: TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_ALISAIE_000_042<tab>Oh, thank the Twelve! I don't know what I would have done... Though, saying that, what will the Resistance do without Commander Kemp?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_ALISAIE_000_042<tab>コンラッド隊長が……！？
クッ……ひとまず状況は理解したわ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_ALISAIE_000_043<tab>Sorry─not here, not now. We should return to Ala Ghiri. Keep an eye out for any wounded who need our help on the way.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_ALISAIE_000_043<tab>道中、助けを必要としている者がいないか注意しながら、
「アラギリ」に向かいましょう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_WOUNDEDRESISTANCESOLDIER_000_050<tab>Oh, oh, bless you, kind─ Wait, is that you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_WOUNDEDRESISTANCESOLDIER_000_050<tab>うぅ……だ、誰だ……。
あ、あなたは<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿……！？

source: TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_WOUNDEDRESISTANCESOLDIER_000_051<tab>I didn't recognize you at first. Been feeling a bit dizzy. Must've lost a lot of blood. I...I can keep going. I can keep going...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_WOUNDEDRESISTANCESOLDIER_000_051<tab>ありがとうございます。
血を流しすぎたようで、意識が遠のきかけていました。
どうにかまだ歩けますので、一休みしてから撤退しますね。

source: TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_WOUNDEDRESISTANCESOLDIER_100_051<tab>Go on without me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I'll not be long.
target: TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_WOUNDEDRESISTANCESOLDIER_100_051<tab>どうにかまだ歩けますので、一休みしてから撤退しますね。

source: TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_WOUNDEDRESISTANCESOLDIERB_000_052<tab>...Thanks, friend. Bloody tourniquet came loose and I was having trouble getting it back on. I should be fine the rest of the way.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_WOUNDEDRESISTANCESOLDIERB_000_052<tab>ハァ……ハァ……助力に感謝します。
止血帯を締め直したら、後方に退きますね。
ありがとうございます……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_WOUNDEDRESISTANCESOLDIERB_100_052<tab>I can manage on my own. Reckon you've got more important things to do than watch over a poor sod like me.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_WOUNDEDRESISTANCESOLDIERB_100_052<tab>止血帯を締め直したら、後方に退きますね。
ありがとうございます……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_WOUNDEDIMPERIALSOLDIER_000_053<tab><pant> <pant> ...It wasn't long ago I was trying to kill you and yours. I half expected you were about to slit my throat.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_WOUNDEDIMPERIALSOLDIER_000_053<tab>グッ……はぁ、はぁ……
お、俺を……敵である俺を助けてくれると？
すまないな、恩に着るよ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_WOUNDEDIMPERIALSOLDIER_000_054<tab>To hells with this. I should be back home in Ilsabard, instead of taking fire from my so-called comrades.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_WOUNDEDIMPERIALSOLDIER_000_054<tab>俺は北州イルサバード大陸辺境の属州出身でな……。
これまでも嫌々戦ってきたが、もう限界だ！
アンタらに投降させてもらうよ……！

source: TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_WOUNDEDIMPERIALSOLDIER_100_054<tab>Put me in a gaol or wherever─I'm through with it. Do you hear me? I surrender!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_WOUNDEDIMPERIALSOLDIER_100_054<tab>これまでも嫌々戦ってきたが、もう限界だ！
アンタらに投降させてもらうよ……！

source: TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_WOUNDEDRESISTANCESOLDIERC_100_054<tab>What should we do? We've got plenty of our own wounded to deal with. Say the word and I'll finish him quick!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_WOUNDEDRESISTANCESOLDIERC_100_054<tab>て、帝国軍の兵士を発見したんです！
でも、怪我をしているようで……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_LYSE_000_055<tab>It's up to all of us to carry on in his stead. It's up to me...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_LYSE_000_055<tab>…………アタシができること……。
アタシにしかできないこと……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_MNAAGO_000_060<tab>I knew we'd lose people doing this, but <var 1A 02 /var>him<var 1A 01 /var>...? I was sure the old bear would outlast us all.
target: TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_MNAAGO_000_060<tab>仲間が死ぬのは、何度経験したって慣れません……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_ALISAIE_000_065<tab>I did what I could for those I found along the way...but some were beyond help.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_ALISAIE_000_065<tab>私の方でも、何人か負傷者を連れ帰ったわ。
でも、帰還できなかった人たちも大勢いる……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_RAUBAHN_000_070<tab>...No need to say it. I heard.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_RAUBAHN_000_070<tab>コンラッド殿のことは、報告を受けている。
残念だったな……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_PIPIN_000_075<tab>We lost a lot of men inside the tower. Casualties are still mounting among those who survived.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_PIPIN_000_075<tab>メインタワーの制圧に向かった部隊に、
大きな犠牲が出てしまった。
私の部下にも、かなりの損害が出ている……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_SERPENTOFFICER_000_080<tab>The Elder Seedseer has been informed. By the grace of the Matron, mayhap we can yet save more lives...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_SERPENTOFFICER_000_080<tab>グリダニア本国に、医療物資の緊急送付を要請しました。
負傷者の命がひとりでも多く助かることを期待しています。

source: TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_STORMOFFICER_000_085<tab>Whatever “rules of war” can be said to exist, that whoreson has broken them all. This will not stand!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_STORMOFFICER_000_085<tab>おのれ、外道め……！
必ずや帝国軍の奴らを粉砕してくれる！

source: TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_ALPHINAUD_000_090<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. We have given over Commander Kemp's remains for safekeeping. Later─I have no idea when─rites must needs be performed...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_ALPHINAUD_000_090<tab>到着したか、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。
コンラッド隊長の亡骸は、どうにか運べたよ。
落ち着いたら、手厚く葬らなければならないね……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_ALPHINAUD_000_091<tab>For now, however, we must carry on. We must press forward. We must not give in to despair...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA612_02538_ALPHINAUD_000_091<tab>だが、悲嘆に暮れてばかりもいられない。
コンラッド隊長は、最期までアラミゴ奪還を強く願っていた。
そのためにできることを、生き残った者として成し遂げよう。
